metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Ingen sanning r allas (Universal Truth) is significantly more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
